response.original_title: Garfield and Friends: An Ode to Odie
response.overview: You'll find out why Garfield is so doggone lucky to have a pal like Odie in this DVD that's filled with frolicking fun, hilarious humor and that uniquely Garfield attitude! Whether the fairy dogmother has him flying, a crazed inventor has him on the rum, or Garfield has him temporarily convinced he's a cow, Odie is one terrific tail-wagger... and his tale is worth telling!
response.tagline: He's Not Just Man's Best Friend.
response.title: Garfield and Friends: An Ode to Odie
